name: figma-plugin-template
description: A template for creating Figma plugins with React for the UI element. It supports Typescript and TailwindCSS out of the box

scripts.test: npm run tsc && npm run build
scripts.tsc: npm run tsc:main && npm run tsc:ui
scripts.tsc:watch: concurrently -n widget,iframe "npm run tsc:main -- --watch --preserveWatchOutput" "npm run tsc:ui -- --watch --preserveWatchOutput"
scripts.build: npm run build:ui && npm run build:main -- --minify
scripts.build:watch: concurrently -n widget,iframe "npm run build:main -- --watch" "npm run build:ui -- --watch"
